## Course Projects

Projects for the Operating Systems course will be listed here. Students can work in groups of 4 on various OS-related topics.

For project ideas, please refer to the [Course Project Ideas spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1eVVmBrCTXHa6XhfewG2S9_if11Ija0s_cNMBp5NMbww/edit?usp=sharing).
